##Analysis

Well, here's a plot:

```{r, preview = TRUE}
ggplot(iris, aes(x= Sepal.Width, y = Petal.Length)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = Species))
```

Here's a table:

```{r}
iris %>% 
  group_by(Species) %>% 
  summarise(Mean_petal_lenght = mean(Petal.Length)) %>% 
  rmarkdown::paged_table()
```
